summary: Implements a wrapper around Azure AIâ€™s reranking service, providing methods to send rerank requests and retrieve ordered results. The class abstracts HTTP communication, supports both synchronous and asynchronous calls, and exposes the underlying model for further customization.
business_intent: Allow applications to improve relevance of ranked lists (e.g., search results, document retrieval) by leveraging Azure AI rerank models through a simple, unified interface.
